remarks: Subspaces of a dual vector space of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lcdlss2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdlss2.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlss2.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` C ) $.
lcdlss2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdlss2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlss2.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcdlss2.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
lcdlss2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdlss2N $p |- ( ph -> S = ( T i^i ~P V ) ) $.
